Trade/Device Name(s): Vancouver Biotech Ltd. Human Cardiac Troponin I Enzyme Immunoassay Test Kit
VBL Serum Troponin I ELISA Test
Regulation Name(s): Creatine phosphokinase/creatine kinase or isoenzymes test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Vancouver Biotech Human Cardiac Troponin I Enzyme Immunoassay Test Kit for quantitative cardiac Troponin I measurement in serum.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for the quantitative determination of cardiac Troponin I in human serum; useful in evaluating acute myocardial infarction (AMI).
